definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: All the hangings enclosing the court were of fine twined linen.
sentences.chinese: 庭院四周所有的帷幔，都是用捻的細麻編成的。

sentences.english: Braid each side, the lumpier the better.
sentences.chinese: 把每邊，越多塊編成辮子好。

sentences.english: The boy collects her leaf and makes them into crown, he dresses up the King of the forest.
sentences.chinese: 收集她的葉子，把葉子編成皇冠，扮起森林裏的國王。

sentences.english: She has a fan made of thin bamboo strips, which is extremely delicate.
sentences.chinese: 她有一把用細竹篾編成的扇子，篾工細密極了。

sentences.english: Jade clothes sewn with gold wire messenger skeleton is not rotten.
sentences.chinese: 金縷玉衣是帝王的葬服，用玉和金線編成。

sentences.english: She braids her hair in little tails.
sentences.chinese: 她把頭髮編成一根根小辮。

sentences.english: The farmer is now pleaching the hawthorn and wild plum.
sentences.chinese: 農民正在把山楂樹枝和野柏樹枝編成矮籬笆。

sentences.english: He truly is God's Son. " Jesus' only crown had been woven from the branches of the little thornbush ."
sentences.chinese: 耶穌唯一的冠冕竟是荊棘樹的枝條所編成的。

sentences.english: They teamed Class One with Class Two.
sentences.chinese: 他們將一班和二班編成一隊。

sentences.english: The students were regimented into large groups for military training.
sentences.chinese: 學生們被編成大組進行軍事訓練。

sentences.english: The men began sorting us into ranks.
sentences.chinese: 男人們開始把我們編成隊列。

sentences.english: I just dramatize the life of a playwright!
sentences.chinese: 我要把一個劇作家的生活編成劇本。

sentences.english: Her hair was pleated in a queue.
sentences.chinese: 她的頭髮編成了一條辮子。

sentences.english: This software can compiled array acoustic logging documents to normal text files.
sentences.chinese: 該軟件可以將陣列聲波測井文件解編成普通文本文件。

sentences.english: The corn stalks are woven into a raft.
sentences.chinese: 玉米杆兒被編成了一隻筏子。

sentences.english: He lumped all the chemical experts together into a group.
sentences.chinese: 他把所有化學專家編成一組。

definition: axle/(fig.) central element/key element/axis (alliance of nations)
to constitute/to form/to compose/to make up/to configure (computing)
the shaft of a pen or writing brush/pen-holder/pen
to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
to overlap/to superimpose/to telescope/to run together/to duplicate/one over another/superposition/an overlap/redundancy/reduplication (in Chinese grammar, e.g. 散散步[san4 san4 bu4] to have a stroll)
to load into/to record/to write into/to enter (data)/to go into (the records)/to go down (in history)
to regulate/rules and regulations/regulatory/style and structure (esp. of building)
